00064         Int_t fRunNumber; //run number of the Muon Veto system
00065         Int_t fMultiADC;  //the number of PMTs in the MuVeto system with an ADC value  
00066         Double_t fDistanceEst; //laser distance from the East wall to the MuVeto System
00067         Double_t fDistanceNemo; //laser distance from the Nemo wall to the MuVeto System
00068         UInt_t fEventNumber;  //the event number returned by IRQ. Note, this can be reset in the middle of a run and there are a number of jumps to very high values
00069         Int_t fFileNumber;  //there are up to 99 files per Run in the MuVeto System
00070         Int_t fMultiTDC; //the number of PMTs with a TDC value 
00071         Int_t fPcTimeSec; //the time in seconds (presumably since Jan 1, 1970) returned by the DAQ PC
00072         Int_t fPcTimeMuSec; //the microseconds elaspsed within the PC time
00073         Int_t fCommonStopTime; //the TDC value of the common stop signal for Muon Veto Events. 
00074
